latex:
The expression\\
\\
\[ \frac{P+Q}{P-Q}-\frac{P-Q}{P+Q} \]\\
\\
where $P=x+y$ and $Q=x-y$, is equivalent to:\\
\\
${ \textbf{(A)}\ \frac{x^2-y^2}{xy}\qquad\textbf{(B)}\ \frac{x^2-y^2}{2xy}\qquad\textbf{(C)}\ 1 \qquad\textbf{(D)}\ \frac{x^2+y^2}{xy} \qquad\textbf{(E)}\ \frac{x^2+y^2}{2xy}  } $
